    public abstract class ContainerScreenExtended<T extends ContainerExtended>
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.inventory.ContainerScreen<T>
implements IValueNotifiable
    An extended GUI container.

      • createServerPressable

        protected net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.button.Button.IPressable createServerPressable(java.lang.String buttonId,
                                                                                         @Nullable
                                                                                         net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.button.Button.IPressable clientPressable)
        Call this to create a button pressable callback so that the container is notified as well, assuming it has a corresponding registered IContainerButtonAction registered in the container by the same button id.
        Parameters:
        buttonId - The button id.
        clientPressable - An optional pressable that should be called client-side.
        Returns:
        The created pressable.
